password.title: Password
password.server_error: Something went wrong. Your password has not been saved.
password.password_too_weak: Your password is too weak. You should add an uppercase, a number, a special character or a longer password.

email.title: Email
email.label: Your email is used for notifications or password recovery.

username.title: Username
username.label: Your username will be displayed when you share files with people or invite them to events.

lang.title: Language
lang.label: This will be the language used in your interface.
